ygData.subject: Re: [Re: Help with Aviaks]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... another one?  If so how come they came up and attacked us when all we were doing was sitting and medding? ... probably still aggro. Seems you and your
ygData.messageBody:
"Salt" <salt@...> wrote:
> From: "Salt" <salt@...>
>
> > thought Aviaks only attacked when attacked or when they saw you attacking
another one? If so how come they came up and attacked us when all we were
doing was sitting and medding?
>
> If someone had previously attacked them, then zoned or died, they were
probably still aggro. Seems you and your friend were the first people they
saw, and they vented their anger upon you.

I would say "aye" to this until what I witnessed today.

Aviaks started attacking people today without warning, even if they had not
been attacked first (agro flag or whatever). Was very strange.

>Shanna on Rallos
